title: A defence and continuation of the Discourse concerning the period of humane life being a reply to a late answer, entituled A letter to a gentleman, &c. : to which is added, an appendix wherein several objections urged in private are considered, and Mr. Gales severe, but groundless charge is examined.
author: Allestree, Richard, 1619-1681.
publisher: Printed, and are to be sold by Enoch Wyer,
